channel.title: 525-603 animations on a 317?
channel.description:
Ok well I recently dled a PI and it had all these new rs emotes. I was wondering how they did that? It had the new run emote, stance, whip and all that great stuff.
EDIT: It also had the d claw GFX too.

item.title: 525-603 animations on a 317?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

A little while ago this community (and others) developed a way to basically have a fake client that collects data from runescape and saves all of the animations, models, and sprites into file forum so we can use them.

Read full topic
